mapper.insert: insert into contract_info (contract_id, company_id, company_party_A_name, company_party_B_name, contract_name, contract_amount, invoice_pattern, contract_file, remark, contract_status) values (#{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyPartyAName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyPartyBName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoicePattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update contract_info set company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_party_A_name = #{companyPartyAName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_party_B_name = #{companyPartyBName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_name = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_amount = #{contractAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, invoice_pattern = #{invoicePattern,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_file = #{contractFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_status = #{contractStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select contract_id, company_id, company_party_A_name, company_party_B_name, contract_name, contract_amount, invoice_pattern, contract_file, remark, contract_status from contract_info where contract_id = #{contractId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select contract_id, company_id, company_party_A_name, company_party_B_name, contract_name, contract_amount, invoice_pattern, contract_file, remark, contract_status from contract_info
